elements.text: You are eating dinner at home with your significant other. While you are eating, you have a random outburst about something your significant other says, and they look taken aback. You know that your partner is just reacting that way because they are concerned about your...

elements.name: Dinner Outburst _Presymptomatic_puzzle1
